name: nba-top20-single-game-scoring-2025
description: NBA Top 20 Single Game Scoring Performances Countdown Video

scripts.render:youtube: NODE_OPTIONS='--openssl-legacy-provider' remotion render src/index.ts NBATop20ScoringYouTube out/NBATop20ScoringYouTube.mp4
scripts.render:shorts-part1: NODE_OPTIONS='--openssl-legacy-provider' remotion render src/index.ts NBATop20ScoringShortsPart1 out/NBATop20ScoringShortsPart1.mp4
scripts.render:shorts-part2: NODE_OPTIONS='--openssl-legacy-provider' remotion render src/index.ts NBATop20ScoringShortsPart2 out/NBATop20ScoringShortsPart2.mp4
scripts.render:square: NODE_OPTIONS='--openssl-legacy-provider' remotion render src/index.ts NBATop20ScoringSquare out/NBATop20ScoringSquare.mp4
scripts.render:thumbnail-youtube: NODE_OPTIONS='--openssl-legacy-provider' remotion still src/index.ts NBATop20ScoringYouTubeThumbnail out/NBATop20ScoringYouTubeThumbnail.png
scripts.render:thumbnail-shorts: NODE_OPTIONS='--openssl-legacy-provider' remotion still src/index.ts NBATop20ScoringShortsThumbnail out/NBATop20ScoringShortsThumbnail.png
scripts.render:thumbnail-square: NODE_OPTIONS='--openssl-legacy-provider' remotion still src/index.ts NBATop20ScoringSquareThumbnail out/NBATop20ScoringSquareThumbnail.png
scripts.render:all: npm run render:youtube && npm run render:shorts-part1 && npm run render:shorts-part2 && npm run render:square
scripts.render:thumbnails: npm run render:thumbnail-youtube && npm run render:thumbnail-shorts && npm run render:thumbnail-square

author: Whoosh Hoopers
